titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” / Mäṣḥafä krǝstǝnna “Book of the Christening”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” (fols. 3ra-96vb) I-1) Mäṣḥaf ʾardǝʾǝt “Book of the Disciples” (fols. 3ra-12vb) I-2) Homily by St. Jacob of Serug for the funeral of priests and deacons (fols. 27vb-34va) I-3) Homily by ʾabba Sälama, Metropolitan of Ethiopia (fols. 44rb-48rb) II) Mäṣḥafä krǝstǝnna “Book of the Christening” (fols. 74ra-96rb)

copyists.copyist: The scribe Nǝway(ä) Maryam is mentioned in the colophon (the later hand a, quires I-II).

donors.donor: The colophon mentiones Fǝssǝḥa Krǝstos as the commissioner.

dcomments.dcomment: Text I-1 (quires A, I-II) dates to a later period (19th cent.ʾ)

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is stained by water. The front board is of slightly irregular shape. The leather cover has been damaged at the spine. The bottom margin of all leaves has been damaged or possibly cut. Fols. 13, 96 have been damaged by insects/rodents at the bottom margin. A cut repaired on fol. 32.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with brown tooled leather (quarter cover). Three sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the brown leather cover (at least 2 tools were used: Double circle, double line fillet).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

txfolios.txfolio: 96+56a; Foliation mistake: the fol. next to 56 is not numbered and it has got number 56a.

squires.squire:
˂A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II(2/fols. 11r-12v)˃ – III(8/fols. 13r-20v) – IV(8/fols. 21r-28v) – V(6/fols. 29r-34v) – VI(8/fols. 35r-42v) – VII(8/fols. 43r-50v) – VIII(8/fols. 51r-57v) – IX(8/fols. 58r-65v) – X(8/fols. 66r-73v) – XI(8/fols. 74r-81v) – XII(8/fols. 82r-89v) – XIII(7/fols. 90r-96v).
Quires A, 1-2 were added later (19th cent.?)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Hand a: 19th century. Hand b: 17th century.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: crude, irregular. Hand b: careful.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a (quires I-II): irregular small letters of smaller size, thick strokes, weak shadings, half-opened rings, Hand b (quires III-XIII): broad, upright and round letter shapes.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; a few lines in the incipit pages of Texts I and II, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of each sections of Texts I and II; names of Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 (e.g., fols. 14rb); elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements; some other words, e.g., ʾǝgäle (e.g., fols. 8ra, 12va, 25vb), halle (fols. 14va), ṣälot (e.g., fols. 15vb, 16rb, 18rb), qǝdmä wangel (e.g., fols. 24vb, 55rb, 57ra), halle luya (fols. 51vb, 54va, 56ava), wä-tǝbl (e.g., fols. 56ra, 60ra, 93rb), sälam (fols. 67ra), wä-ʾǝmzǝ (e.g., fols. 78va, 80vb, 92vb).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ይ፡ ካ፡ for ይበል፡ ካሕን፡ (e.g., fols. 10rb, 76ra, 77ra) ይ፡ ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡ (e.g., fols. 10rb, 12ra, 75rb) ይ፡ ሕ፡ for ይበል፡ ሕዝብ፡ (fol. 10rb) እስመ፡/ እስመ፡ ለ/ለዓለም፡ for እስመ፡ ለዓለም፡ ምሕረቱ፡ (e.g., fols. 65rb, 65vb, 66ra)

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Text I-1 ends with an embedded colophon on the translation from Coptic and Arabic: fol. 96rb-va: ተተርጐመ[ት፡ ዛ]ቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ በልሳነ፡ ቅብጢ፡ ወዓረቢ፡ ኀበ፡ ነገረ፡ ግዕዝ፡ ስረዩ፡ ወባርኩኒ፡ ለጸሐፊሐ፡ ኀጥእ፡ ወአባሲ፡ በአንብሮ፡ ቆብዕ፡ ዘእመስል፡ ፈላሲ፤ ወልብየሰ፡ ምሉዓ፡ ጹግ፡ ከይሲ፡ ከመ፡ ይደምስስ፡ አበሳየ፡ ወአበሳክሙ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ እምነግህ፡ እስከ፡ ይመሲ፡፡ ለዓ[ለ]መ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡፡ ወአሜን፡፡ - Text II is called Mäṣḥafä ṭǝmqät on fol. 74ra.

colophon.det: The colophon mentions the name of the scribe Nǝway(ä) Maryam (the later hand a) and the commissioner Fǝssǝḥa Krǝstos (for quires I-II)

extras.extra: - Immediate correction marked by thin lines below or above the word fols. 14rb, 66va. - Corrections written interlineally: fols. 24vb, 28va, 36ra, 54rb, 65rb, 66va, 77ra, 82vb, 84va. - Words or passages erased: fols. 21rb, 29va, 31vb, 48rb. - Spaces between asterisks filed with thin horizontal lines in black and red: fols. 24ra, 24vb, 25va, 26ra, 26vb, 54rb, 59rb, 83ra. - Thin horizontal lines splitting a single word: fols 38ra, 53rb, 74va. - Scribe’s and commissioner’s signature on fol. 12vb.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - A note in the upper margin referring to the content of the Ms.: fol. 3ra. - A thread for navigation in the text has been inserted in the upper margin of fol. 92.
